  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x430

          LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 310x18
            text run at (2,2) width 310: "There should be a green border table below this:"
        LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,22) size 784x408 [border: (2px solid #008000)]
